meanings.definition: A person who does not own land.
meanings.sent1: The nonlandowner rented a small apartment in the city.
meanings.sent2: Many nonlandowners prefer to invest in stocks instead of real estate.
meanings.sent3: The nonlandowner joked that they were the 'king of the sidewalk'.
meanings.sent4: In a world of landowners, the nonlandowner felt like a fish out of water.
meanings.sent5: The nonlandowner dreamt of one day owning a piece of land to call their own.
